mapper.select: SELECT seq_doctor AS seqDoctor, schedule_doctor_holiday_start AS scheduleDoctorHolidayStart, schedule_doctor_holiday_end AS scheduleDoctorHolidayEnd, schedule_doctor_content AS scheduleDoctorContent, schedule_doctor_write_date AS scheduleDoctorWriteDate, schedule_doctor_update_date AS scheduleDoctorUpdateDate FROM doctorschedule WHERE seq_doctor = #{seqDoctor}

select p.seq_protector_schedule seqProtectorSchedule, a.seq_member seqMember, p.seq_animal seqAnimal, p.seq_doctor_schedule seqDoctorSchedule, p.schedule_protector_holiday_start holidayStart, p.schedule_protector_holiday_end holidayEnd, p.schedule_protector_content scheduleProtectorContent, p.schedule_protector_write_date scheduleProtectorWriteDate, p.schedule_protector_update_date scheduleProtectorUpdateDate from protectorschedule p, animal a where p.seq_animal = a.seq_animal and a.seq_member = #{seqMember}
mapper.insert: insert into doctorschedule (seq_doctor, schedule_doctor_holiday_start, schedule_doctor_holiday_end, schedule_doctor_content, schedule_doctor_write_date, schedule_doctor_update_date ) values (#{seqDoctor}, #{scheduleDoctorHolidayStart}, #{scheduleDoctorHolidayEnd}, #{scheduleDoctorContent}, NOW(), NOW() )
